text: The Supreme Leader of Iran is the head of state of the Islamic Republic of Iran. The Supreme Leader is also the highest ranking Islamic cleric in the country. The position of Supreme Leader was created after the Islamic Revolution of 1979 in Iran. The Supreme Leader is more powerful than the President of Iran and chooses the heads of many powerful posts in the military, the government, and the judiciary. Ayatollah Khomeini (died 1989) and Ali Khamenei have become Supreme Leader of the Islamic Republic so far. ==References== == Related pages == * President of Iran Category:Heads of state Category:Iranian Islamic religious leaders Category:1979 establishments in Asia Category:1970s establishments in Iran
title: Supreme Leader of Iran
